title: Dan Rather~The Media/ Election Politics (CBC Sunday,SoS) 2007 02
description:
Dan Rather~The Media/ Election Politics (CBC Sunday,SoS) 2007 02 17 avi

16.41 min 
71 mgs

Few people have as much experience chronicling and analyzing Presidential elections as this longtime journalist. Rather is still covering the current U.S. presidential primaries - but not for mighty CBS, reporting instead for a small cable channel. What has made him so critical of the way this important race is being covered by the mainstream media?
What are the dangers of corporatization of the media and its threat to freedom of the press?

Interviewed by Evan Solomon, with Carol MacNeil
